title: Lila - An Inquiry into Morals - By Robert M. Pirsig - Chapter 31
description: This chapter reveals Lila's fate, but will it answer Rigel's question?

i can't seem to stop thinking about it

he said it was a perception how did you

that

then he remembers something else i was

just as we were crossing the back of

she said where

regard
did she become pregnant after that

he was beginning to feel like the

on my boat she wants to go back
because you talked her into it

regale didn't say anything

regell
he went down below and sat across from

i hear you want to go back

she still looked down
why are you going back
i looked up and then finally said i

you don't know how bad but now i've

i know that but they need me who
my mother and everybody
he looked at her well
he wanted to ask if they need you so

he just sat there like a child at a

there was really nothing more he could

lyla looked at him for a long time

and waited some more but she just sat

i'm all right
then he thought for a while
then he thought for a while longer
wondering
in what he knew would be the last chance

as futurists watched him start up his
